content: this headband has lots of texture while keeping you stylish and warm can be made in sizes newborn baby toddler child teen and adult pattern includes size chart and row counts for each size skill level *beginner-will need knowledge of basic crochet and sewing skills *written in u s crochet terms materials *red heart unforgettable yarn -40-100 yards in color of choice *5 mm h crochet hook *measuring tape *scissors and yarn needle *stitch markers *faux lather tag optional if you have any questions or see any mistakes within this pattern please feel free to email me directly at t m pcrochetcreations@gmail com any information or photos within this pattern are the sole copyrighted property of t m p crochet creations this pattern is for personal use only please do not copy share translate or distribute pattern you can sell your final product but please give credit to me the designer by tagging me on facebook @t m p crochet creations instagram @t m pcrochetcreations
